wikitext.*:
{{short description|Mysterious shadow in the sky}}
{{unnamed}}

During the [[Quest of the Ring]], a mysterious '''shadow''' passed over the [[Fellowship of the Ring]] in the night, darkening the stars as it moved over [[Eregion|Hollin]]. The origin of this shadow is unclear, as it was moving fast and against the wind.<ref>{{FR|South}} p. 286</ref>

==Background==
The shadow was not one of the [[fell beasts]] of the [[Nazgûl]] because, as the [[Orcs|Orc]] [[Grishnakh]] had stated, the Ring Wraiths had been forbidden by [[Sauron]] to cross the [[Anduin]] until after the [[War of the Ring]] progressed.<ref>{{TT|Uruk}}, p. 452</ref> A similar shadow had passed over [[Amon Hen]] when Frodo wore the Ring.<ref>{{FR|Breaking}}, p. 401</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
The Shadow passes over the Fellowship already in the earliest manuscript version of the story of their trip in Hollin, notably before Tolkien's conception of the fell-beasts.<ref>{{RS|Ring}}, pp. 421-22</ref>
